name: The Rhubarb Company
description: At Rhubarb, we don’t believe in a ‘black box’ solution to our clients’ needs. We believe that getting to know you and understand your needs, your customers and your market is the best way to design the most effective service. Every project we take on is unique and tailored to suit the needs of our clients; this is our guarantee of a personal welcome and service. Regardless of the size of your business, we will always guarantee you a personal service, where your customers come first.

locations.address: The Innovation Building, 940 Heeley Close, Kent Science Park
